name: Battery Bolt
description:
Battery Bolt

You've escaped captivity. After weeks of relentless pecking, you've broken out of your cage in the chicken battery. You can taste freedom. All that's left is to make it past the guards undetected and find your five friends. However it's not going to be quite that simple...

You see, the entire game is played on a Nokia 3310 and, well... let's just say it's seen better days (it's 20 years old after all), and it keeps turning itself on and off. The guards can still capture you even if the Nokia is turned off, so make sure to take cover in a safezone before that happens.

Rescue your band of beaky brethren and bolt from the battery before the battery bolts you!


How To Play Num Pad 1, 2, 3 & 5 Move Num Pad 0 Lay an (explosive) egg Enter Start the game


Tips

Keep your eye on the battery level. It will warn you when the power is about to go out. Make sure you get to a safezone before the power goes out or the guards may snatch you.

You can collect eggs and drop them as an explosive. The explosion will temporarily stun the guards and allow you to pass them.

Your five chicken friends hide near flowers. When you see flowers you should follow them.




Battery Bolt is a Nokia 3310 Jam #3 submission. Thank you to everyone who played.
